ModMetaData.name: Hotkey for i
ModMetaData.author: elfxiong
ModMetaData.description:
Add a hotkey for "i" (View Information). Whenever you see an "i" icon, you can press I to view information. You don't have to click the tiny "i" anymore.
When there are more than one "i" on the screen, there is no guarantee which one is chosen.
Key binding can be changed in Menu - Options - Keyboard configuration.
